When you make the water bath you are supposed to use a bowl that is larger than the pan so that it rests on top and doesn't directly touch the water below. This is to very slowly melt the chocolate to keep all of the textures and flavors the way they are supposed to be. If you have it the way shown there is a big chance that you get water into the chocolate while melting and ruin it.
